DOC.brief_summary: To document the short term & long term effect of treatment with Nasonex (mometasone furoate nasal spray) in moderate to severe adenoids hypertrophy (which cause > 50% obstruction of the posterior choanae).
DOC.brief_title: Nasonex (Mometasone Furoate Nasal Spray) in Adenoids Hypertrophy in Children (P04367)
DOC.criteria: 211 years of age, nasal obstruction for 3 months, adenoids hypertrophy > 50% of posterior choanae. adenoids hypertrophy < 50% of posterior choanae recurrent epistaxis or immunodeficiency, severe septal deviation, kissing tonsils, choanal atresia, large masses, known allergy to nasonex (mometasone furoate nasal spray), chronic otitis media, cystic fibrosis, acute infection.
